verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Step by step, every day, He will lead us all the way; Nothing can our hearts dismay, While we follow, follow Jesus.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: One step at a time, you see, Is enough for you, is enough for me; So we’ll follow faithfully, Follow, follow Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Step by step, all is right, Though we walk by faith, not sight; E’en the darkness turns to light, While we follow, follow Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Step by step, some glad day, Homeward we will wend our way; Never can we go astray, While we follow, follow Jesus.
